com.facebook.buck.java.intellij

Class IjModuleGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.java.intellij.IjModuleGraph

  • public class IjModuleGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a graph of IjModules and the dependencies between them.

    • Method Detail

      • createModules

        public static ImmutableMap<BuildTarget,IjModule> createModules(TargetGraph targetGraph)
        Create all the modules we are capable of representing in IntelliJ from the supplied graph.
        Parameters:
        targetGraph - graph whose nodes will be converted to IjModules.
        Returns:
        map which for every BuildTarget points to the corresponding IjModule. Multiple BuildTarget can point to one IjModule (many:one mapping), the BuildTargets which can't be prepresented in IntelliJ are missing from this mapping.

      • from

        public static IjModuleGraph from(TargetGraph targetGraph,
                 IjLibraryFactory.IjLibraryFactoryResolver libraryFactoryResolver)
        Parameters:
        targetGraph - input graph.
        Returns:
        module graph corresponding to the supplied TargetGraph. Multiple targets from the same base path are mapped to a single module, therefore an IjModuleGraph edge exists between two modules (Ma, Mb) if a TargetGraph edge existed between a pair of nodes (Ta, Tb) and Ma contains Ta and Mb contains Tb.
